Title: Relates to the liability of electronic marketplaces for compensation for damages for defective goods
Summary: Provides that an electronic marketplace provider shall be deemed to be a retailer for purposes of New York strict liability law and shall be strictly liable for all damages caused by defective products placed into the stream of commerce to the same extent that a retailer of that defective product would be liable.
LawCode: Add ยง11-108, Gen Ob L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general obligations law, in relation to the liability of electronic marketplaces for compensation for damages for defective goods
